channel.title: Times of India
channel.description: The Times of India: Breaking news, views, reviews, cricket from across India

item.title: Live: Modi sets aside protocol, welcomes Xi Jinping in Ahmedabad
item.description: Xi was accompanied by his wife and a high-level delegation. Xi, who flew down from Colombo, became the first world leader to begin an India visit from Gujarat.

item.title: Former Assam DGP, under scanner in Saradha scam, found dead
item.description: Former Assam director general of police Shankar Barua, quizzed recently by CBI in connection with Saradha scam, allegedly shot himself dead at his residence today.

item.title: Modi's birthday: Mother gives blessings and Rs 5,000 for J&K relief fund
item.description: President Mukherjee also called up Modi to wish him.

item.title: BJP will come strong in Haryana, Maharashtra polls: Amit Shah
item.description: Forget bypoll outcome, BJP will come strong in Haryana & Amit Shah keywords: Amit Shah, Narendra Modi, bypoll

item.title: Adani breaks into top 10 rich club as wealth jumps 152%
item.description: A sharp 152% jump in his wealth saw Adani Group chairman Gautam Adani break into the list of 10 richest Indians even as Mukesh Ambani retained the pole position, according to a latest report.
